Freedom Is Life.name: Freedom Is Life
Freedom Is Life.flavor: Ribbons of glowing symbols flow out of you, linking you and your allies in a river of celestial light.
Freedom Is Life.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you and any allies within 20 squares of you gain a +10 bonus to saving throws.

Sheltering Wings.name: Sheltering Wings
Sheltering Wings.flavor: It is no shame to take refuge beneath the Platinum Dragon’s wings.
Sheltering Wings.effect: You regain hit points equal to your bloodied value. One ally adjacent to you also regains hit points equal to your bloodied value.

Anthem of Progress.name: Anthem of Progress
Anthem of Progress.flavor: Erathis’s grim efficiency inspires your comrades to their necessary work.
Anthem of Progress.target: You and each ally in the burst
Anthem of Progress.effect: Until the end of the encounter, each target can score a critical hit with any at-will attack on a roll of 16–20.

Unerring Foreknowledge.name: Unerring Foreknowledge
Unerring Foreknowledge.flavor: Hints of action and intention spread like gossamer trails that only you and your friends can perceive. Follow the trails and pierce the veils of time.
Unerring Foreknowledge.effect: The target can take an extra standard action on his or her next turn.
Unerring Foreknowledge.sustainMinor: Choose a different ally within range. That ally can take an extra standard action on his or her next turn. You cannot choose an ally as a target of this power more than once during an encounter.

Test of Strength.name: Test of Strength
Test of Strength.effect: The targets simultaneously hit each other with melee basic attacks as free actions. If your attack deals more damage than the enemy’s, you can take a standard action as a free action. Any attack roll you make with this standard action has a +4 power bonus.

Wild Surge.name: Wild Surge
Wild Surge.flavor: Wild Melora blesses those who can kill for themselves.
Wild Surge.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and any ally within 5 squares of you can score a critical hit with any daily attack power on a roll of 18–20.

Celestial Balance.name: Celestial Balance
Celestial Balance.flavor: Against the mightiest enemies, there is one hope: Pelor endures.
Celestial Balance.trigger: A creature within 10 squares of you spends an action point
Celestial Balance.target: You or one ally in the burst
Celestial Balance.effect: The target can spend a healing surge and gains a +1 bonus to all defenses until the end of the encounter.

Death Is Nigh.name: Death Is Nigh
Death Is Nigh.flavor: The shadow of the queen’s wing falls over your fight.
Death Is Nigh.requirement: You or one of your allies must have failed a death saving throw during this encounter.
Death Is Nigh.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and your allies gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

Horns of the Moon.name: Horns of the Moon
Horns of the Moon.flavor: The goddess blesses and curses, sometimes in the same breath.
Horns of the Moon.effect: At the start of each of your turns until the end of the encounter, as a free action you choose one ally and one enemy within your line of sight. The ally you choose gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls until the start of your next turn. The enemy you choose takes a –2 penalty to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

Renewing Dawn.name: Renewing Dawn
Renewing Dawn.flavor: A glimpse of the true sun flashes above the battlefield, sending flares that lance down into your foes.
Renewing Dawn.effect: When you or one of your allies spends a healing surge before the end of your next turn, this power deals radiant damage equal to one-half your level + your Charisma modifier to an enemy within 5 squares of the creature that spent the healing surge.

Horn of Life.name: Horn of Life
Horn of Life.flavor: As a foretaste of the feasts in Chauntea’s dominion, her cornucopia spills its blessings upon you.
Horn of Life.target: You or one ally in the burst
Horn of Life.effect: The target can spend a healing surge. At the start of each of your subsequent turns, until the end of the encounter, your ally with the fewest number of hit points above 0 gains regeneration 20 until the start of your next turn. The effect ends if you become unconscious.

High Arcana.name: High Arcana
High Arcana.flavor: Corellon’s mastery of the arcane allows you to choose between empowerment or defense for you and all your allies in the battle.
High Arcana.target: You and each ally in the burst
High Arcana.effect: Until the end of the encounter, at the start of each target’s turn, the target can choose to gain either a +2 power bonus to implement attack rolls or a +4 bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will until the start of his or her next turn.

True Death.name: True Death
True Death.flavor: Your gesture strips the undead of their tricks. Only death is left to them.
True Death.target: Each undead creature in the burst
True Death.effect: You regain 2d20 hit points for each target. Each target loses all its resistances, the insubstantial quality, and the ability to recharge powers (save ends all).
True Death.aftereffect: Target loses all its resistances, insubstantial abilities, and ability to recharge powers (save ends all).

Forge of Creation.name: Forge of Creation
Forge of Creation.sourceRef: Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, Divine Power
Forge of Creation.flavor: The fervor of Moradin’s ancient workshops of creation inspires you and your allies as you hammer upon your foes.
Forge of Creation.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you and any of your allies who hit with at least one attack regain their second wind if they have already used it in this encounter, regain one healing surge, and gain the use of another daily magic item power.

Supreme Knowledge.name: Supreme Knowledge
Supreme Knowledge.flavor: In the divine view, to understand is to control.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: You are hit by an attack against Fortitude, Reflex, or Will  Effect: Make a monster knowledge check that corresponds to the creature that is attacking you. If your check result exceeds the monster’s attack roll, the attack misses.
Supreme Knowledge.trigger: You are hit by an attack against Fortitude, Reflex, or Will
Supreme Knowledge.effect: Make a monster knowledge check that corresponds to the creature that is attacking you. If your check result exceeds the monster’s attack roll, the attack misses.

Waxing Fortune.name: Waxing Fortune
Waxing Fortune.flavor: Your battle fortune swells like the moon waxes toward full.
keywords: Personal   Effect: Until the end of the encounter, on each of your turns, you gain a bonus to attack rolls equal to the number of bloodied, conscious creatures that are within 10 squares of you at the start of your turn.
Waxing Fortune.effect: Until the end of the encounter, on each of your turns, you gain a bonus to attack rolls equal to the number of bloodied, conscious creatures that are within 10 squares of you at the start of your turn.

Sune's Censure.name: Sune's Censure
Sune's Censure.flavor: Your power forces your enemies to share their weaknesses.
keywords: Close burst 20  Targets: Two creatures in the burst  Effect: Choose two targets. Extend the vulnerabilities of one target to the other until the end of the encounter, so that they are both vulnerable until the end of the encounter, even if the original ability was only temporary. If neither targets is vulnerable to a damage type, then both targets gain vulnerable 5 all until the end of the encounter.
Sune's Censure.effect: Choose two targets. Extend the vulnerabilities of one target to the other until the end of the encounter, so that they are both vulnerable until the end of the encounter, even if the original ability was only temporary. If neither targets is vulnerable to a damage type, then both targets gain vulnerable 5 all until the end of the encounter.

Tempus's Glare.name: Tempus's Glare
Tempus's Glare.flavor: You call this battle to the attention of the Lord of Battles. His divine glare hastens the fall of the incompetent.
keywords: Personal   Effect: Until the end of the encounter, every creature that attacks you and fails to hit takes damage equal to onehalf its level.
Tempus's Glare.effect: Until the end of the encounter, every creature that attacks you and fails to hit takes damage equal to onehalf its level.

Battle Judgement.name: Battle Judgement
Battle Judgement.flavor: You have learned to emulate Torm’s decisive timing.
Battle Judgement.trigger: Your melee attack drops an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer
Battle Judgement.effect: You regain hit points equal to the damage you dealt with the attack.

Divine Regeneration - Chosen.name: Divine Regeneration - Chosen
Divine Regeneration - Chosen.flavor: You ignite the divine spark that glows within you, unleashing a wave of regenerating energy for a short time.
Divine Regeneration - Chosen.effect: You gain regeneration equal to your highest ability score until the end of the encounter.
